name: LeaffalCaterpillar
description:
After you, Slime Slime, got into so arson related hijinks. You, Slime Slime, find yourself running for your life from a very angry caterpillar.

Stick to the falling leaves and launch yourself downwards to survive. 

Controls:

left/right arrow keys or a/d: move/rotate leaf

space: jump

Credits:

- Programming: me

- Art: Jemma

- Music/Sound FX: Peter
